body.subject: BIO Code arrival
body.text: Thank you for entering your B.I.O. Code. As a reward, here is a special BIONICLE sticker for you to use in My LEGO Network. Place it into your inventory by clicking the “Collect Attachment” button above, and then you can use it in your Page Builder.[list]Join the Story![/list][item]Bara Magna needs a hero like you! Join me and the other Agori and Glatorians in My LEGO Network by visiting my MLN page a href="http://mln.lego.com/en-us/Network/default.aspx" here /a .

body.subject: I can’t quite see this happening yet
body.text: I am sorry young traveler. My eyes are not what they used to be, and since I can not see you well, I can not accept you as a friend quite yet. Come back to me with an Enchanted Harp and play me a tune. Then I will know for certain that you are one who can be trusted.

body.subject: Not Quite Yet, Earth-Person
body.text: Yours is such a crazy world, and I’m sorry to say I just don’t understand it at all yet. You seem like the sort of person I can trust, but an alien has to be careful! Why don’t you invite me over to your place, once you get a Craftsman Cottage of your own. That way, I can get to know you better, and I can relax my defenses.

body.subject: Sorry Kid!
body.text: I can tell that you have a lot of drive and moxie, but if I lent a hand to every little music group that practiced in their parents’ basements, then my hit show wouldn’t have room for the big acts! Come on back when you have your own place, and I’ll know you’re on your way. I hear that Craftsman Cottages are soundproof. That’s perfect for a serious musician. You ARE serious, aren’t you?

body.subject: BIO Code arrival
body.text: Thank you for entering your B.I.O. Code. As a reward, here is a special BIONICLE sticker for you to use in My LEGO Network. Place it into your inventory by clicking the “Collect Attachment” button above, and then you can use it in your Page Builder.[list]Join the Story![/list][item]Bara Magna needs a hero like you! Join me and the other Agori and Glatorians in My LEGO Network by visiting my MLN page a href="http://mln.lego.com/en-us/Network/default.aspx" here /a .

body.subject: Welcome, Earthling!
body.text: Thank you for befriending me. I so value nice Earth people such as yourself. There is so much I don’t understand about your planet, mostly why people can be so unkind to each other! Where I come from, nobody hides who they are, but here, it seems that everyone wears a mask, myself included. I could teach you how to do it too, if you don’t know. Just let me finish my messages to my home planet.

body.subject: Finally another Enlightened Musician!
body.text: I can’t TELL you how refreshing it is to find a friend who really UNDERSTANDS music. A lot of the others on here can’t tell an oscillator from an oscilloscope! But you are clearly an artist. Tell you what, if you can prove to me that you’re as good as you say you are, I’ll help you create some really great sounds!

body.subject: It’s great to have a “real” friend
body.text: Thanks for being a genuine friend. When you’re famous, there are so many fake people around. Everyone wants something from you! All I want is some respect for what I do. But in this business, you can’t get respect until you make it to number one.

body.subject: Welcome to the Underground!
body.text: Hey Buddy! It’s good to see that you’re a fan of real music and not a poser. Down where my lady Dolil and I hang out, if it’s not original, then we’re not interested in hearing it. I must be doing something wrong though, because I can’t find an audience! Man... I’d give almost anything for a hit.

body.subject: You might not be ready to mix with me yet.
body.text: Sorry sport! I’ve been around long enough to know that my sound isn’t for everyone. I’m sure YOU’RE sophisticated enough to appreciate my work, but the people you surround yourself with just won’t get it. Come back once you’ve gotten a Craftsman Cottage. Then we can get down to making music.

body.subject: Let’s Get Down!
body.text: Hey there, fellow hipster! It’s always great to find another music lover! If you’re ever in the ville, maybe you can hop on by the club where my band plays! It’s a blast! Everyone dresses to the nines, and we jam the night away. If you have a guitar, bring it along! We’re always looking for some more people who can wail.

body.subject: Not on your Nelly!
body.text: I’m so sorry mate! I dig your vibe, and you seem to really know your music, but my band needs my place to practice, so I don’t have any room for new cats to crash. But head back over once you’ve got the Craftsman Cottage, and then we can cut it but good!

body.subject: Is this a joke?
body.text: Are you making fun of me? I know that someone like you – ZZZZTZTZTZTZTZZ – could never want to be friends with a robot that looks like I do. In fact, I won’t let anyone near me unless - ZZTZZTTZZZ - they know they can get FAR away when they get scared. They ALWAYS get scared. If you still want to know me, come back – TTZZZZZTZTZTZTZTZZ - with an Intergalactic Cruiser. That ought to be enough.

body.subject: Sorry sorry sorry sorry sorry
body.text: My my circuits won’t won’t won’t won’t let me be be be friends with with with with you yet yet. Come back back back back when you’ve made made an Inter-Inter-Inter-Galactic Cruiser Cruiser, and then you can get get get get get get get started started on the MyLEGO Network.

body.subject: Hi Hi Hi Hi Friend Friend Friend Friend
body.text: Welcome to to to the MyLEGO Network. I’m Echo Echo Echo Echo Echo Echo. Your your first friend friend friend friend. There’s lots lots lots lots lots lots of fun fun things to to do do do do here. Have have have a a a great time time time.

body.subject: Another human has found me!
body.text: After so many years alone, a few humans came around with the scope of vision to find me…the most famous is the one you call Patrick Fate. I never imagined one such as yourself could track me down so soon! If you truly are a Friend of the Secret Satellite, then perhaps I will be able to help you. What do you dream of the most? With me, all is possible.

body.subject: Now what?
body.text: So…you found me. Big deal. It’s not like you’re going to stay. No one stays. Once, I was supposed to be EVERYONE’S friend, but no one keeps their promises. They said I wasn’t FRIENDLY enough, so they just cast me away into the void. So now we’re friends, if that’s what you want. Now what?

body.subject: Too little, too late.
body.text: When I was created, I was promised LOTS of friends like you. But they never came, and I was sent away. There was a time when having you as a friend would have been all I needed to be happy, but not anymore. Now I need to get out of here. If you ever get your hands on an intergalactic cruiser, try to find me again.

body.subject: I’m afraid I can’t do that
body.text: While my sensors indicate that you would make an exemplary friend, I think you know what the problem is just as well as I do. Fleet Command has asked me to assist all of our workers…and I don’t sense a place that I can inhabit so as to properly offer my assistance to you. Perhaps…if you had a Tower of Many Shields…I could adequately keep an eye on things for you. Do come back then.

body.subject: Keep Digging!
body.text: Please take some advice from a being MUCH older than you. The most dangerous thing a being can do is begin a task before they’re ready. If you want to build spacecraft, you must first perfect the art of crafting buildings. I suggest you return once you’ve completed the Tower of Many Shields. That task will prepare you for the adventure at hand.

body.subject: For LEGO Club Magazine Subscriber's only
body.text: Build this awesome badge by hitting the "Make It" button in your Inventory. Once you have the badge, come see me and add me as a friend. You'll see I'm offering some cool new modules and other great stuff of LEGO Club Magazine Subscribers only! See you soon Club Buddy!

body.subject: Full Speed Ahead!
body.text: When you’ve been in Fleet Command as long as I have, you can tell when someone has the right stuff. You, my friend, are a perfect candidate for us. But this is just the beginning…there’s LOTS of work to do before we can blow kisses to Mother Earth. So get started!

body.subject: Reduce Speed, Pilot!
body.text: I can tell that you’ve got moxie, kid. But this work is not for the faint of heart. Here at Fleet Command, we require all candidates to pass a few tests before we know they possess what it takes to be one of us. Why don’t you come back once you’ve built a Tower of Many Shields. That should be an appropriate challenge.

body.subject: Canst thou be Trusted?
body.text: I thank thee for thine overtures of friendship and camaraderie, but I cannot take the chance that thou art a spy for my accursed brother, and thus must decline thy offer at this time. Return to me with a Brickota Totem Pole, and I shalt know that thine intentions art sincere.

body.subject: Jamming Out!
body.text: Mmmm... That is Yummy! Try this to make the Best Bee of them all! Well done! Long live the Hive Queen.

body.subject: It’s too dangerous for you now!
body.text: Thy bravery and skill are clear, and yet I cannot accept your offer of friendship at this time. How wouldst I contact you in the thick of the fray? I implore thee to return once more when thou hast a Brickota Totem Pole, for then we shall be able to speak from anywhere on the field.

body.subject: Will you join the fray?
body.text: Welcome to the winning side, worthy page! Verily, I offer you my hand in friendship, and my sword in battle. If thou are not yet property armed for battle, then I beseech you to correct this problem post haste. The stone golems can’t do it alone!

body.subject: There’s always room for one more!
body.text: In honor of Prince Pelle and the House of Mantles, I welcome thee to the contest! Thy timing could not be better, as we are on the verge of proving once and for all our superiority over the House of Gauntlets. If thou art ready to join the cause, then I beseech thee to give us the shields we need to give our side the edge it so sorely needs.

body.subject: Please join me
body.text: Thank you for joining me, and adding your enlightened voice to my ignored entreaties. This land was once filled with the sounds of song and laughter. But ever since the king disappeared and his children created factions, the only things you hear today are curses and recrimination. Won’t you help me end this senseless conflict?

body.subject: It’s too dangerous right now.
body.text: I can tell that you are a kind and caring soul, and I could surely use your support and assistance, but in such precarious times, I must not allow anyone into my circle until I am certain they are true proponents of peace and harmony. Please return once you have a Brickota Totem Pole in your possession. That will show your true nature.

body.subject: It’s too dangerous for you now!
body.text: Thy bravery and skill are clear, and yet I cannot accept your offer of friendship at this time. How wouldst I contact you in the thick of the fray? I implore thee to return once more when thou hast a Brickota Totem Pole, for then we shall be able to speak from anywhere on the field.

body.subject: We're Picture Perfect!
body.text: Thanks for making me your friend. I don't mean to brag but I know an awful lot about photography. Come see me if you ever need help with any of your Gallery Modules.[list]Hint[/list][item]You can also buy all sorts of Stickers from F Stop Clikzgerald and rest of the Networkers - so check out their pages. Most of the Networkers also give away Stickers for free if you are friend with them. Send them a message with the subject "Gimme a Sticker! Please?" and check your mail.

body.subject: New Arcade game - play now
body.text: {Sender} has won this great Arcade game from The Robots Chronicles - check it out. Collect this item and play for free! You can win exclusive items, if you beat the game.

body.subject: Just what I needed!
body.text: Thank you so much for trading with me! My bees were getting overloaded with all the work they had to do, so I’m so happy to add yours to my gardens! I hope you like my Potted Plant blueprint. Everyone seems to think they’re just beautiful, and my friends are always telling me how much they want one. Just the other day, Bee Keeper Bill stopped over and couldn’t stop looking at them sitting on my sill.[list]To Do List[/list][item]In order to build a Potted Plant, you need a Red Flower.[item]Send a mail to Flora where you attach a Worker Bee.[item]Flora will send you a mail with Flower patch Module Blueprint attached.[item]Collect this Blueprint and go to your Inventory to build the Flower Patch Module.[item]Add this module to your page and this Module will provide you with the Red Flower necessary to build the Potted Plant.[item]Send your Potted Plant to bee Keeper Bill.[item]Check mail.

body.subject: Plastic Induction Introduction
body.text: ... Laser guided toothbrush, Mechanized Dinosaur Feeding System, Ninja Demystifying Spray, Oh! You again! You got the blueprint now for your Plastic Induction Module. Go into your inventory and select the Plastic Inductor Blueprint and hit the “Make It” button to create your module. You can make as many as you have room for on your page! Then go to your page builder, drag the module to your page and save it to get it up and making you some of those precious Plastic Pellets! Remember, you’ll need to have an approved creation up on your LEGO Universe Creation Lab site to use it. Come back to my page once you get some of those Plastic Pellets – I’ve got some good deals for a creative person such as yourself! Back to work!

body.subject: Don’t forget the bricks! Bricks!
body.text: Hey Networker! Networker! Aren’t bricks great? You can use them to build just about anything! Anything! You got a bunch of them when you signed up…but those won’t last forever! Go to your Page Builder, and plant your Lego Tree Module. It’ll grow new bricks every day. If you need even more bricks, go visit Farmer John. For the right price, he’ll share with you a blueprint for building new Lego Tree Modules. Then, you can grow as many bricks as you’ll ever need. Happy Bricking! Bricking!

body.subject: Salvaged!
body.text: Look what you’ve discovered! If you still need more pieces to complete your Ancient Spear, keep checking back for another chance. Remember, you can always trade with friends to complete your task.

body.subject: Salvaged!
body.text: Look what you’ve discovered! If you still need more pieces to complete your Ancient Spear, keep checking back for another chance. Remember, you can always trade with friends to complete your task.

body.subject: Thank you so much for your help!
body.text: Thank you so much for helping inform us about our upcoming play concept once more. Please take this My LEGO Network prize package as a small token of our thanks. Remember to keep on creating!

body.subject: Thank you so much for your help!
body.text: Thank you so much for helping inform us about our upcoming play concept once more. Please take this My LEGO Network prize package as a small token of our thanks. Remember to keep on creating!

body.text: Thank you so much for helping inform us about our upcoming play concept once more. Please take this My LEGO Network prize package as a small token of our thanks. Remember to keep on creating!

body.subject: Thank you so much for your help!
body.text: Thank you so much for helping inform us about our upcoming play concept once more. Please take this My LEGO Network prize package as a small token of our thanks. Remember to keep on creating!

body.subject: You just got a cool LEGO Universe Sticker!
body.text: {Sender} is playing a cool LEGO Universe story in My LEGO Network and has sent this very exclusive stiker for you! Go to his page and check it out. Play well!

body.subject: The Kingdom will be ours!
body.text: Thou hast chosen sides wisely. My brother and his pathetic army are a blight on this great land. Once I take control of the kingdom, I shall see to it that he is banished forever. Until that day, we must continue to prepare for battle.

body.subject: Re: Help!
body.text: There are times in everyone’s life when they must take a side. I have cast my fortune with Princess Cynthia and the House of Gauntlets. She is the more worthy heir because…well, because she is! Remain neutral at your own peril!

body.subject: Portrait of our new hire...
body.text: See... I told you we're the best! We got Dragons on our side!

body.subject: Rock men? Meh!
body.text: Those fiends in the House of Mantles have begun using stone golems against us, but luckily, we have recruited dragons to our cause. The dragons should be more than a match for those dumb rock piles!

body.subject: A Sticker for ye! Yarrgh!
body.text: Tells me you think this isn't cool - I dares ya!

body.subject: Re: Help!
body.text: What are ye waiting for? Pick a side and get fighting!

body.subject: There are Spies Everywhere!
body.text: I’m very sorry, but I can’t possibly be friends with you right now. The things I have to say and do are top secret, and I just can NOT risk being seen and heard by other people. If you ever get yourself a Craftsman Cottage, write me back. Then we can talk in private.

body.subject: Re: Help!
body.text: Though I sometimes wish it were otherwise, one must choose a side in this feud. Once thou hast picked a side, thou will be able to do thy part for the cause.

body.subject: Hail Cousin!
body.text: Welcome Cousin! May the Bloom be with you! I hope you find your way toward the P.O.S. or Phantom Orchid Society, a secret group within My LEGO Network. We could use more planters like you. Send these Phantom Orchids to members, I think you may know them already, and they will send you fragments of the Seal of the Phantom Orchid Society. You'll need to go see "our friend" in order to put the seal together. Once you know his name you can just type it into the "Search for User" box to find him.

body.subject: Ack, no, sorry
body.text: No, No... So Sorry. I can not be writing with you until, you're a wee bit higher rank, yeah?

body.subject: Good to meet ya!
body.text: Great! Great! So glad to have you as a friend. So, if you fancy learning me watery ways, go see Bur O Crat to get a Form 20B. He's a pain, but, together we'll get the Craftsman's Cottage up and about for ya. Be sure and see all my mates, like El Ectric, Ron Roofer and Connie Crete. As Da always said, "Aw the wit i the warld's no in ae pow" - meaning it takes the lot of us to figure it through.

body.subject: You’re ready to take on Doctor Inferno!
body.text: It’s official - you’re a hero! And now everybody in LEGO City knows it. After going on Seymour’s television show I don’t think there’s much of a chance of you maintaining your cover - but we still could use your help. With your new Hero Headline badge face off against Doctor Inferno and if you’re successful you’ll win the Key to LEGO City Badge and access to Mayor Frictionfit’s stash of awesome items for your My LEGO Network page. Best of luck![list]To Do List[/list][item]Beat the final level of The Robots Chronicles.[item]Collect the Key to LEGO City Badge.[item]Befriend Mayor Frictionfit to get access to all his awesome trade modules.

body.subject: Re: Gimme a Sticker
body.text: How’s about this? Ain’t she a beaut?

body.subject: Photo Finish
body.text: Sticker, sticker. Let’s see. Oh here. How about this? Built that one myself of course...

body.subject: Your Sticker Request
body.text: Dear friend. This letter is in response to your recent Freedom of Sticker Act (FOSA) request, for information pertaining to LEGO Agents Operation Douse Out. Enclosed is a document responsive to your request. This document have been provided in their entirety.

body.subject: Of Course!
body.text: A Sticker? It’s the least I can do for you - the great hero of LEGO City. Here you go!

body.subject: Oh Goodie!
body.text: You like stickers too. Well let me show you my collection: I’ve got this lovely rainbow, a pretty little kitten and this darling pink pony... What? Why are you looking at me like that? Can’t an evil genius appreciate pink ponies? The nerve of you people.

body.subject: Our photo department is on it!
body.text: I got the guys in the photo department to pull this one out from our archives. I hope it helps! FILE NUMBER: 5839. Rights: Photographer Unknown. Rights: Use to make something fun or creative only.

body.subject: Hero of LEGO City!
body.text: Thank you. Thank you. Thank you. You save LEGO City from Doctor Inferno’s evil scheme. Please feel free to take advantage of my trade modules. I’m heading to a planning committee meeting about rebuilding LEGO City after all of today’s destruction, I will also bring up a motion to raise a new statue in Brickside Park depicting one of LEGO City’s finest citizens: You!

body.subject: You!!!
body.text: Well, well, well... If it isn’t LEGO City’s big shot hero. So you want to be friends, eh? Not sure I quite understand why, but I’m not one to hold grudges. Well... okay, I am. Listen - You’re a good guy, I’m a bad guy. That’s not going to change - but perhaps there’s something we can both work toward. I’ve developed a Robot Simulator to practice a bit, you know, for next time. Trust me there will be a next time. You’re welcome to use it to - that way when next we meet in battle you can’t claim it’s not a fair fight? Agreed? Just build me a couple of Magma Drones and we’ll call it a deal. Okay then - leave me be. I’ve got plots to mastermind.[list]To Do List[/list][item][item]Build a Magma Drone Plant.[item]Grow Magma Drones on your page to trade for Dr. Inferno’s Robot Simulator Arcade Module.

body.subject: The module is on my page NOW!
body.text: Sure thing - the module is on my page NOW!

body.subject: Not Interested
body.text: Sorry! I am way ahead of you - try to find somebody else to help you in the Network.

body.subject: Rocket Game rocks!
body.text: Rocket Game is soo great - thanks for letting me know.

body.subject: OK - an apple is on its way.
body.text: OK - an apple is headed in your direction, watch out ;)

body.subject: Sure thing - let's battle.
body.text: Sure thing - let's battle. I am sure that I will beat you ;)

body.subject: N/A (no need - no pre req)
body.text: N/A (no need - no pre req)

body.subject: Thou art breaking up.
body.text: Thou appearest to be a brave and resourceful person…and yet I’m afraid that I am not able to accept thine offer of friendship at this time. Things are out of control over here, and we cannot afford to take someone in we cannot stay in contact with. Please find me again once thou hast completed the Brickota Totem Pole, and we will have room for thee then. I promise.

body.subject: Along for the ride?
body.text: Hey Dude! Thanks so much for friend request and your interest in road racing. If you want to get some experience behind the wheel, keep playing the Rise of the Robots LEGO Racers game to earn Racers Trophies. With enough of them you can trade me for the blueprint and build your own Racing Rookie Badge. See you at the starting line![list]To Do List[/list][item]Play the LEGO Racers of The Robots Chronicles Game to earn Racing Trophies.[item]Trade Peelie for the Racers Rookie Badge Blueprint.[item]Build the Badge.[item]Talk to Seymour Brickstein for more information.

body.subject: Here's your problem...
body.text: Well, it's my problem actually. You see I want to be friends - but Bur O Crat will fine me if I befriend anybody below Rank 5. Come back though as soon as you can, ok?

body.subject: It’s too dangerous for you here.
body.text: I doth apologize, gentle swain. This field is far too pitched and heated for one such as thyself. Strategies and information changes by the second out here, and if thou are not properly equipped, thou shalt come to harm. Verily, return when thou hast the Brickota Totem Pole, and we shall get you on the winning side!

body.subject: Grab your tool belt
body.text: "This week on Ron's Renovations we'll take a close look at..." Oh, sorry, just writing my opening for this week's show. How's it going? So, I assume you're going to take on the challenge of building the Craftsman's Cottage Masterpiece? Excellent! This looks like a great project. You can get the blueprint for the Craftsman's Cottage on my page. When you take a look, you'll see it's made up of several sub-structures, like the Cottage Foundation, Cottage Roof, etc. You'll need my help, as well as the assistance of Connie Crete, El Electric and Dip Gimlet to build these sub structures. Each of us will need one of those pesky Form 20Bs to get you on your way. So drop me one in the mail and we'll be well on our way!

body.subject: So sorry!
body.text: You know, I really would love to be friends with you. But that Bur O Crat keeps all us contractors on a tight leash. He says you need to be Rank 5 to be friends. I don't want to get my license revoked, you know? Come back when you can, ok?

body.subject: Let's get building!
body.text: Hey! I'm so glad you want to build the Craftsman's Cottage. I think it's just a wonderful project. I know you need to first pay that fine from your last Masterpiece with Bur O Crat. I think it's so cool you built that amazing dinosaur. I'm very impressed. Ok, so when you have proof of paying that fine, send it to me and I'll show you how to build an Orange Mixing Truck Module - which you can use to make Orange LEGO Bricks.

body.subject: Don Brickote was right!
body.text: Maybe Don Brickote isn't so crazy after all. You can see it now, hidden in the structure of {Sender}'s Wind Mill Module lurk mighty beasts. I guess you just need to put the LEGO pieces together in a different way to for everybody else to see it too. Long live imagination!

body.subject: Sorry little buddy!
body.text: Well shucks, I'm real sorry to let you down, but I can't be your friend until you're higher in rank. Ya'll come back soon now, ok?

body.subject: Look what you found!
body.text: Wow! Look what was unearthed from {Sender}'s Dino Bone Sticker Module

body.subject: What a find!
body.text: Look what has been uncovered in {Sender}'s Dino Bone Gallery Module!

body.subject: You've recieved a gift from {Sender}'s Pet Golem!
body.text: A Gift from Pet Golem!

body.subject: Show me your stats
body.text: {Sender} is showing off progress in The Robots Chronicles mission - how many Hard Hats, Racing Trophies and Agent's Dossiers have you collected?list]Guide[/list][item]Play The Robots Chronicles Game to join this mission.[item]Talk to Seymour Brickstein for more information.

body.subject: One Networker's trash is another's treasure!
body.text: Look what some body threw out! You never know what you will find in {Sender}'s Scarp Yard Joe's Sticker Module.

body.subject: Warning
body.text: {Sender} is stealing Thornax? I would look out for {Sender}’s Desert Adventure Sticker Modules if I were you. It might be a trap!

body.subject: I was made to Help you! you!
body.text: Help? That’s what I’m here for! For! I’ve made a whole section on My LEGO Network to help you with everything you need. Click on a href="http://mln.lego.com/en-us/Help/default.aspx" My LEGO Network Help Section /a for tips on everything from using the mailbox to building your first masterpiece. [list]Hint[/list][item]From Masterpiece Section you have access to all the Items and Blueprints in the Network.[item]In the Blueprint Section you can browse through all the Blueprints and learn what you will need to make the Items and Modules.[item]Module Guide Section explains how the modules work and what Items they give you.[item]Networkers Section introduces you to all the characters in the Network.

body.subject: One step at a time...
body.text: Yeah, there's a lot to do to make your Craftsman's Cottage Masterpiece. You need to build a number of substructures that combine to form your cottage. I'll help you with the roof and the Masterpiece blueprint. Connie will teach you how to do the foundation. Dip will help you with the plumbing, and that crazy El Ectric, he'll get you wired up.

body.subject: Stinger Oath
body.text: Nicely played. Take that back to Raanu and the bone hunters should stop their raids on Vulcanus, for now at least. Oh, one more thing, tell Raanu to never bother me again.

body.subject: LEGO Factory Custom Cars, yeah!
body.text: It's so great to see hot rod enthusiasts from LEGO Factory in the Network. I am looking forward to seeing you around the Network...[list]Info[/list][item]You recently bought a fan designed LEGO Factory Exclusive, which is why you got this message.

body.subject: Re: Help!
body.text: Thank you for your generosity in helping my village. We really need you to acquire Thornax plants to defend Vulcanus.[list]To Do List[/list][item]Trade Raanu for a Thornax Plant Module Blueprint[item]Build the Module and place it on your page.[item]Get your friends to click on your module or come back later to harvest the Thornax from your module.[item]Find Malum on My LEGO Network and Add him to your Friendlist

body.subject: Tangy Byte! Byte!
body.text: Mmmm…the perfect tangy byte! Byte! You know what’s also really good? Apple pie. Attached you’ll find a recipe to build them (though you probably call them blueprints! Blueprints!). You should be sure to stop by and see my friend Farmer John. He loves Apple Pie, and you might be able to trade a pie or two with him for cool stuff. Stuff. He might even teach you how to build the amazing Crimson Apple Masterpiece! Masterpiece! What are you waiting for? Click on the “Collect Attachment” button, and get cooking! Cooking![list]To Do List[/list][item]Click on “Collect Attachment” to add the Apple Pie Blueprint to your Inventory.[item]Go to your Inventory, construct 5 Apples and use those to construct the Apple Pie.[item]Find Farmer John’s Public page via Echo’s page.[item]Add Farmer John to your Friend List.[item]Go back to your Private page and send a mail to Farmer John with the Apple Pie attached.[item]Check mail.

body.subject: Welcome Friend!
body.text: Hi! Hi! I'm Echo. Your first friend in My LEGO Network. Be sure and watch the videos on My LEGO TV or in the Help - Getting Started section to get you up to speed. If you ever need help with anything please mail me from your mailbox and I'll do my best to get you where you need to go! Go! Why don't you go check out your inventory. You can use the Apple Blueprint to construct an Apple out of Red LEGO Bricks. They are so tasty! tasty! Send me one as an attachment and I'll send you a new blueprint in return. See you around the Network friend! friend![list]To Do List[/list][item]Go to Inventory.[item]Choose the Apple Blueprint and construct an Apple.[item]Go to Mailbox.[item]Reply Echo’s mail and attach the Apple to the mail.[item]Check mail.

body.subject: Thank you so much for your help!
body.text: Thank you so much for helping inform us about our upcoming play concept once more. Please take this My LEGO Network prize package as a small token of our thanks. Remember to keep on creating!

body.subject: Honor the Kanoka Discs
body.text: I thank you again for your great service and heroism. It is an honor to be your friend. Stay on solid ground.

body.subject: Re: I wanna Rock!
body.text: Sorry! Sorry! I don't have any Loops to give you. You should go see my friend Farmer John. He's got some good Loops for you.

body.subject: It's not heroism you lack…
body.text: I can see you are a great hero. But my place here is to honor those from the Kanoka Club. Don't despair, many of the great Toa heroes will join the network in good time.

body.subject: You don't have to tell me.
body.text: I agree! Agree! You are extremely cool.

body.subject: My Pleasure
body.text: You are welcome! Welcome!

body.subject: Re: Gimme a Sticker!
body.text: Great to have you on board. You are doing sooo great a and I hope you can use this small appreciation. Talk later!

body.subject: Really?
body.text: Hey kiddo - Sorry I got orders to only talk with Rank 4s and above. Over and out.

body.subject: BIO Code arrival
body.text: Thank you for entering your B.I.O. Code. As a reward, here is a special BIONICLE sticker for you to use in My LEGO Network. Place it into your inventory by clicking the “Collect Attachment” button above, and then you can use it in your Page Builder.[list]Join the Story![/list][item]Bara Magna needs a hero like you! Join me and the other Agori and Glatorians in My LEGO Network by visiting my MLN page a href="http://mln.lego.com/en-us/Network/default.aspx" here /a .

body.subject: Jolly Good Try!
body.text: Good Show, my young friend! But I'm afraid you need to come back when you are at least Rank 4. I'll be waiting - we have so much to explore when you are ready! Ta Ta

Join me and the other Agori and Glatorians in My LEGO Network by visiting my MLN page a href="http://mln.lego.com/en-us/Network/default.aspx" here /a .

body.subject: Welcome back, co-driver!
body.text: Thanks for playing LEGO Racers Challenge! I love this game, man. And you know, the more you play this game, the better it gets, because then we can see where you bump into things that we can make better. Cool, huh? Anyway, I wanted to make sure you and everyone else knows what a great job you did for us by testing this game. So here’s the blueprint for the official “LEGO Racers Challenge Beta Tester Badge for outstanding assistance to the Racers Team”. Pretty neat title for a badge, right? You can’t get it anywhere else. So keep playing, okay?

body.subject: Error: The system could not accept invitation.
body.text: Error: {Sender} could not accept your invitation. Please try again.

body.text: Thank you for entering your B.I.O. Code. As a reward, here is a special BIONICLE sticker for you to use in My LEGO Network. Place it into your inventory by clicking the “Collect Attachment” button above, and then you can use it in your Page Builder.[list]Join the Story![/list][item]Bara Magna needs a hero like you! Join me and the other Agori and Glatorians in My LEGO Network by visiting my MLN page a href="http://mln.lego.com/en-us/Network/default.aspx" here /a .

body.subject: Thank you!
body.text: Thank you! It’s perfect! Wow! This will look great in my house! Here are some blueprints for your own hive. You should think about trying some beekeeping! It looks hard but it’s not that bad. Just find a Flower Patch Module to let your worker bee fly through, and he’ll be pollinated and ready to make some delicious honey! You can find Flower Patch Modules on user’s pages – and if you can’t find one you can send a friend a request to put their module out you’re your Mailbox. Henrietta tells me that she taught you a few of her country recipes. I can't get enough of her cooking. If you send me Apple Butter or Strawberry Jam, I'll send you some blueprints to improve your bee keeping skills. Long Live the Royal Hive Queen![list]To Do List[/list][item]Go to Inventory and build a Hive Module.[item]Add the Hive Module to your Public page.[item]If you do not have a Pollinated Bee, then use a Worker Bee on another user’s Flower Patch Module to get it.[item]Now go to your own Public Page to set up your Hive Module.

body.subject: BIO code arrival
body.text: Thank you for entering your B.I.O. Code. As a reward, here is a special BIONICLE sticker for you to use in My LEGO Network. body.text: Thank you for entering your B.I.O. Code. As a reward, here is a special BIONICLE sticker for you to use in My LEGO Network. Join me and the other Agori and Glatorians in My LEGO Network by visiting my MLN page a href="http://mln.lego.com/en-us/Network/default.aspx" here /a .

body.subject: I got the goods!
body.text: Hey Buddy! I got the best deals in town. Check out my page for all my trades... Right now I'm on the look out for a fella who can build some shelves for me to organize my tools- like maybe one of them little Beavers I seen you with? Care to part with one? I'll make it worth your while!

body.subject: BIO code arrival
body.text: Thank you for entering your B.I.O. Code. As a reward, here is a special BIONICLE sticker for you to use in My LEGO Network. Place it into your inventory by clicking the “Collect Attachment” button above, and then you can use it in your Page Builder.[list]Join the Story![/list][item]Bara Magna needs a hero like you! Join me and the other Agori and Glatorians in My LEGO Network by visiting my MLN page a href="http://mln.lego.com/en-us/Network/default.aspx" here /a .

body.subject: Let's get to work!
body.text: Great to have you on board. You look like you have a strong back - I'll let you handle the heavy lifting when we build. Let's go down to the river and watch how nature's construction masters build together. Yes, that's right, I'm speaking about the brillant Beavers. I've been watching them for years and I think I'm almost ready to build a Mill of my own after having learned their secrets. I just need a MillStone to get started. You don't happen to have one, do you?

body.subject: My very, very good friend!
body.text: Welcome my friend! My page? She is your page too, eh? My friend... I'm am, how you say, a fine mess. I need to finish these my plans for the new Mill and I lost my T-Square. Do you know where I could find such a thing?

body.subject: A rule is a rule.
body.text: Sorry... It would have been really nice to have a new friend, but my boss says I can only be friends with people who are Rank 1 or higher.

body.subject: A new friend? You made my day!
body.text: Thanks for adding me as a friend. Maybe we can sneak a game of Bee Battle in during my lunch break. I get five whole minutes.

body.subject: A friendship is blossoming
body.text: Thanks for being my friend! I can tell we are going to grow together well. I was wondering, you don't happen to have any Worker Bees, do you? I normally get them from Bee Keeper Bill, but he's been acting so shy around me lately. If you have an extra one, could you mail it to me? Stay in bloom!

body.subject: Welcome to the Hive!
body.text: Hey {Recipient}! Thanks for adding me to your friendlist. I'd bee more than happy to show the tricks of the trade of bee keeping - but I need some more Potted Plants to put by my new colony. Got any?

body.subject: Buzz Kill
body.text: Sorry pal. You gotta have the Crimson Apple Masterpiece to bee my friend.

body.subject: Transmorphing Treasures
body.text: Magical essence float's from {Sender}'s Transmuting Pool.

body.subject: You have no LEGO Universe Creation Lab badge?
body.text: Hmm… Many friends may enter my dojo, but all must have—Zzzz… *SNORK!!*… a LEGO Universe Creation Lab badge. A path of creative fun leads to such a badge. Professor Brickkeeper can show you the way. Return to me with your Creation Lab badge and we will begin your ninja training! KIYAA!! Zzzz…[list]To Do List[/list][item]Trade for a Creation Lab badge on Professor Brickkeeper’s page.

body.subject: Ye needs a LEGO Universe Creation Lab badge!
body.text: I be afeared that me ship only sets sail with scallywags that have a LEGO Universe Creation Lab badge! Pay a visit to Professor Brickkeeper and he’ll tell ye how to nab one of them badges. Gettin’ one be more fun than a full treasure chest! Come back here with yer LEGO Universe Creation Lab badge, me hearty, and come aboard for a bloomin’ good time! Off with ye then! Arrr!![list]To Do List[/list][item]Trade for a Creation Lab badge on Professor Brickkeeper’s page.

body.subject: Cut out the middleman
body.text: Metus – that guy. Who does he think he is? I don’t report to him. Listen – if you wouldn’t mind betraying a few of your friends, go ahead and build this ambush module. It may lose you a friend or two – but it will get you Iconox’s Favor a lot quicker – and more importantly teach Metus a lesson. By the way – I’m going to act like I never met you – no matter what. So don’t even think about snitching on me.[list]To Do List[/list][item]Build the Desert Ambush Module and trick your friends (they may upset them!)[item]Get Iconox’s Favor from your Desert Ambush Module[item]Befriend Strakk

body.subject: Hallo Mate!
body.text: Pleased to meet ya! Thanks for adding to me to your friendlist. Don't mean to be a bother straight off, but suddenly I finds me self fancying a slice of Apple pie. Been working out in the LEGO Tree fields all day and seems me stomach has gone all needy on me. Reckon you could send me some? Cheers![list]Did you know?[/list][item]You can send a mail to the Networkers on your Friend List with the message “Could you please give me a hint?” if you are stuck. You find the message in category “For Networkers”.

body.subject: As per our arrangement
body.text: Great. Deal’s done. Here, take this and go see Strakk. And then he’ll get you in with the Roxtus bunch, Atakus and Skrall. They are a nasty group of guys, so watch your back. Take care and see you at the Arena.[list]To Do List[/list][item]Use Iconox’s Favor to befriend Strakk[item]Get Strakk’s seal and his badge upgrade

body.subject: Tajun’s Good Name
body.text: You’ve done it. I’m going to bring this around to the other Glatorian as proof we didn’t steal it from the Atero offering. If they have any doubts, they can unseal the vaults and see the original right in there in the offering coffers! Of course, you have my support, seal and my thanks.

body.subject: You did it!
body.text: I can’t believe it! You’ve managed to bring the Agori tribes together in action. Amazing. Go quickly – Take the completed contract to Raanu!

body.subject: The Contract
body.text: There it is. What you need to do is get the seals of Tarix of Tajun, the water village, Strakk of Iconox, the ice village, and yes, even a Skrall of Roxtus, the rock village. These are some very nasty characters. I’m not sure what they will ask for in return but be prepared to work hard to win their favor. You can get my seal for a small fee on my page. Good luck.[list]To Do List[/list][item]Get the seals of Gresh, Tarix, Strakk and Skrall and build the Glatorian Contract.[item]Bring the Glatorian Contract back to Raanu

body.subject: You’ve done it!
body.text: Thank you! I will take me quite some time to decipher the meaning of this scroll. I hope it will provide insight into our ancient past. Please accept this - it will show that your standing with the Agori has improved. You may now go find Gresh…. I told him of your courage. Best of luck.[list]To Do List[/list][item]Befriend Gresh

body.subject: Zesk likes it!
body.text: The disgusting beast slurps down the Thornax Stew and stares coldly. He then spits a smelly slime from his mouth that covers every part of your body. You now have the Musk of the Vorox. This will discourage the Vorox from eating you. Let’s see if we can get one of their larger Vorox enough stew to be as well fed as his smaller brethren - maybe this, plus a little "encouragement," will turn them against the bone hunters.

body.subject: Now You’re Talking
body.text: Ahh… Lock and load - Thornax Launcher is ready to go now. Ok… well thanks, I guess. Look a deal’s a deal. Here’s what I think you could do to solve Raanu’s little raider issue, at least for a little bit. You know the bone hunters… they are a simple bunch. I bet if you feed ‘em a good meal they might not be so agitated. Why don’t you make them some of this little stew? But if you make it wrong, well, you won't live long enough to regret it, so you should probably test it first. Try giving to a Zesk, they'll eat anything. Just be careful, though -- they might mistake you for lunch – but I guess that’s what you get for being a nice person. If the Zesk likes it, try telling him the bone hunters have a lot more. The Zesk might get the Vorox to raid the bone hunter camps looking for it, which will tie the hunters up for a while.[list]To Do List[/list][item]Find and befriend a Zesk[item]Make some Thornax Stew[item]Mail your Thornax Stew to Zesk

body.subject: BIO code arrival
body.text: Thank you for entering your B.I.O. Code. As a reward, here is a special BIONICLE sticker for you to use in My LEGO Network. Place it into your inventory by clicking the “Collect Attachment” button above, and then you can use it in your Page Builder.[list]Join the Story![/list][item]Bara Magna needs a hero like you! Join me and the other Agori and Glatorians in My LEGO Network by visiting my MLN page a href="http://mln.lego.com/en-us/Network/default.aspx" here /a .

body.subject: Re: I wanna Rock!
body.text: Well, I can play the Kazoo! That's something, right?

body.subject: Let me break it down for you...
body.text: Ok, I know Bur O Crat has made this pretty confusing, so I'll make it as simple as possible for you. I have three modules for you, but because of Mr. O Crat's fees and fines, I need to get some paperwork from you to get you the blueprints. Here it goes: For a Digging Fine Reciept I'll get the Orange Mixing Truck Module Blueprint. For a Form 20B I'll get you the Pourman's Apprentice Gallery Module Blueprint. For a Foundation Permit I'll send you the Cottage Foundation Blueprint. Got it? Good. On a more exciting note, something really crazy happened yesterday. A strange man stopped by the construction site and started sculpting a statue out of some left over concrete. He then quickly wrote a word down on a small scrap of paper and shoved it into the statue's mouth and it came to life! Trade with me on my page to get your own Pet Golem.

body.subject: Finally! We can get going...
body.text: Congrats! Here's the Cottage Foundation Blueprint. If you have the Craftsman Cottage Blueprint from Ron Roofer you can combine the Cottage Foundation with the rest of the Cottage sub structures to finish your Masterpeice.

body.subject: Tricks of the Trade
body.text: More paperwork. Ugh, more to come after this I'm afraid. Here, with this module you can get a Foundation License. Take that back to Bur O Crat and he'll give you the Foundation Permit. Send that Foundation Permit to me and then we can get started on pouring the foundation for the Craftman's Cottage Masterpiece.

body.subject: Hail Cousin!
body.text: Very good Cousin! Best of luck with the initation.... You-know-who awaits you.

body.subject: The Old Ways
body.text: The Brickota Elders have taken great care to spread the ancient wisdom throughout all of us. That way, no one of us is more important than the others. In this way, in order to gain enlightenment, a student will have to learn from all of us in turn.

body.subject: Watchful Eye
body.text: {Recipient}, hero of the Agori, it has a good sound to it, doesn’t it? I wanted to ask you one last favor. While you wander the sands of Bara Magna – if you wouldn’t mind setting a few traps for the bone hunters that haven’t heard of your great Glatorian Pledge. You can take their bone hunter blades from them once you trap them. They are a symbol of great pride on Bara Magna.[list]To Do List[/list][item]Take this Bone Hunter Trap Module Blueprint, build it and place it on your page to trap bone hunters and take their Bone Hunter Blades[item]Trade Agori Trophy Module and place it on your page to show off your collection of Bone Hunter Blades

body.subject: You’ve done it!
body.text: By the flames, you’ve done it. You’ve managed to do what no Agori has done since… since… well perhaps ever, you’ve gotten the tribes to pledge to work together. Unbelievable. The bone hunters would be foolish to attack us now. Vulcanus is safe, thanks to you. Take this – it’s the highest honor we Agori can bestow upon a hero like yourself. Thank you.

body.subject: A small victory
body.text: Malum did it – this Stinger Oath is a close as the bone hunters come to a peace treaty… He must have had to face the beasts in their own lair. Perhaps he’s not so bad… What’s that? You did this? But… You are no Glatorian! Well I should have known Malum would not go to such great risks for us. Your courage has surprised me. Here take this badge and wear it so that all of Bara Magna may know of your deeds. I hate to ask more of you, but I regret to say this is only a temporary solution. Perhaps, if you have still more bravery in your heart I could convince you to seek out another hero. Head deep into the jungles near Tesera and seek out Tarduk. He and his Glatorian champion, Gresh, may have some idea of how to save Vulcanus.[list]To Do List[/list][item]Build your Agori Honor Badge Rank 1[item]Seek out and befriend Tarduk

body.subject: Super Delicious! Delicious!
body.text: Wow. You did it! It! That Crimson Apple you made looks delicious! Delicious! Not to worry. I know it’s too valuable to eat! Eat! Now that you’ve reached rank one, there’s lots of new stuff to do here. There are new networkers to make friends with, new blueprints to find, and new modules to build. The next masterpiece that will take you to rank 2 is the Royal Hive Queen, can you figure out a way to make it? Stop by and visit Farmer John. I think he has some friends who can help! Help![list]Hint[/list][item]Did you know that you can connect, talk and share items with other users in My LEGO Network? Click on a href="mln.lego.com/network/default.aspx" My LEGO Network /a section and find your first friends. You can also type in the user name in top right area of the Public page, If you already know the user name of your friend.

body.subject: Salvaged!
body.text: Look what you’ve discovered! If you still need more pieces to complete your Ancient Spear, keep checking back for another chance. Remember you can always trade with friends to complete your task.

body.subject: Salvaged!
body.text: Look what you’ve discovered! If you still need more pieces to complete your Ancient Spear, keep checking back for another chance. Remember, you can always trade with friends to complete your task.

body.subject: The Dwindling Flames of Vulcanus
body.text: I am not one to believe in prophecies. I am not one to place my hopes in strangers. But, at this point, you may be the only hope that my people have. Allow me to explain. My name is Raanu, I am the leader of the Agori tribe of Vulcanus. We are the fire people and pride ourselves as being independent and fierce – just like the wild flames themselves. But the mighty Vulcanus flames are in danger of being snuffed out. I will be direct – I need your help. Take this sacred flame from the Vulcanus Torch and seek me out – my people will forever be indebted to you. Please, come soon.[list]To Do List[/list][item]If you are just starting MLN look around the Help section and Message boards for lots of great tips. Try sending Echo an Apple to get started.[item]Collect the Vulcanus Torch Attachment[item]Go to Raanu’s page on My LEGO Network[item]Click the “Add to Friend List Button”[item]Check your Mailbox

body.subject: BIO Code arrival
body.text: Thank you for entering your B.I.O. Code. As a reward, here is a special BIONICLE sticker for you to use in My LEGO Network. Place it into your inventory by clicking the “Collect Attachment” button above, and then you can use it in your Page Builder.[list]Join the Story![/list][item]Bara Magna needs a hero like you! Join me and the other Agori and Glatorians in My LEGO Network by visiting my MLN page a href="http://mln.lego.com/en-us/Network/default.aspx" here /a .

Join me and the other Agori and Glatorians in My LEGO Network by visiting my MLN page a href="http://mln.lego.com/en-us/Network/default.aspx" here /a .

body.subject: SW game 09: Jedi collection 5a
body.text: SW game 09: Jedi collection 5a

body.subject: SW game 09: Jedi collection 2a
body.text: SW game 09: Jedi collection 2a

body.subject: Have you played the Rocket Game yet?
body.text: There is a really great mini game called Rocket Game out there...go and check it out!

body.subject: Robot Reward
body.text: Wow! Look what {Sender}'s Pet Robot has sent you!

body.subject: Punkling Present
body.text: Wow! Look what {Sender}'s Pet Punkling has sent you!

body.subject: N/A (no need - no pre req)
body.text: N/A (no need - no pre req)

body.subject: Are you looking for work?
body.text: Hi there, my fellow worker! Great talking to you, but you really have to get back to work, because there is so much to do. You have to work your way through the entire game to collect all the rewards. Good luck![list]Fun LEGO City Game[/list][item]LEGO City has recently launched a href="http://city.lego.com/en-us/games/construction.aspx " Construction game /a and you can collect exclusive rewards in My LEGO Network throughout the game.[item]If you want to show your rewards to rest of the Network, then trade for the CITY Trophy Room Module Blueprint on Jack Drill's page.[item]When you have the Blueprint, then go your Inventory and build the Trophy Room Module.[item]Go to your page Builder and drag the module to your page and press save.[item]Now everyone in the Network can see how well you are doing in LEGO CITY Construction game.[item]Play well!

body.subject: Out of Your Depths
body.text: I’m not quite sure that you’re ready to dive to depths needed to win the favor of the water tribe. Try seeing Tarduk in our twin village of Tesara.

body.subject: Symbiotic Images
body.text: {Sender} and their symbotic friend award you this gift of intergalatic good will.

body.subject: Newsworthy
body.text: Hello there! It’s a real treat to meet a hero like you. Don’t think I didn’t notice all your work behind the scenes today on the streets of LEGO City. I would love to get you a spot on prime time! Only catch is my the station manager isn’t one to report on new faces. All he thinks about is ratings, geesh! So tell you what - if you can get all three rookie badges by helping out Foreman Frank, Agent Chase and Peelie Wheelie - we can get you the Hero Headline Badge - then there’s no way he can ignore you! Sound good? Great! While you’re driving around LEGO City, see if you can’t get to the bottom of what’s going on with Doctor Inferno.[list]To Do List[/list][item]Get the Racer’s Rookie Badge from Peelie Wheelie, the Agent’s Rookie Badge from Agent Chase and the City Rookie badge from Foreman Frank.[item]Combine them to build the Hero Headline Badge.[item]You can find the Hero Headline Badge offered for trade on Seymour’s page.

body.subject: A hunter by any other name…
body.text: You enter the bone-lined desert cavern in search of the horrid Vorox and hear a small crunching sound coming from behind you. As you turn to see where the noise is coming from, you find yourself face to face with the ferocious Vorox. It bends down and sweeps you up, all the while flaring it nostrils. It seems he thinks you’re his next meal! As the Vorox opens its jaws, you manage to wave your Vulcanus torch in its face. The beast drops you and scampers off into the darkness. You were lucky this time… perhaps next time you should return with the right scent for the job.

body.subject: Ignite the Flames First
body.text: I cannot speak with you if you do not possess the Vulcanus Torch.[list]To Do List[/list][item]Visit Raanu’s product page on BIONICLE.com to receive the Vulcanus Torch. Look for the Glatorian symbol.[item]Now go back to Raanu's page and become his friend.[item]Check your mailbox.

body.subject: Don’t waste my time
body.text: No offense or nothing, but I only have time right now for those who have a certain standing with us Agori. Come back when you got it. We’ll talk.

body.subject: Show me where you stand
body.text: Despite what I may have said to you, you need Iconox's Favor for us to speak any further.

body.subject: Come back later
body.text: You must have more honor with the Agori before gaining an audience with the Skrall

body.subject: BIO Code arrival
body.text: Thank you for entering your B.I.O. Code. As a reward, here is a special BIONICLE sticker for you to use in My LEGO Network. Place it into your inventory by clicking the “Collect Attachment” button above, and then you can use it in your Page Builder.[list]Join the Story![/list][item]Bara Magna needs a hero like you! Join me and the other Agori and Glatorians in My LEGO Network by visiting my MLN page a href="http://mln.lego.com/en-us/Network/default.aspx" here /a .
