body.subject: Public Skin from LEGO Universe...Great
body.text: Hi! Hi. I can see that you just got the greatest Skin from LEGO Universe. Congratulations. Please read the instructions below to get it on your public page.[list]To Do List[/list][item]Go to your Page Builder and into Edit Background[item]Now you can choose your new improved Public Skin[item]Remember to save your page before leaving Page Builder :)

body.subject: New LEGO Universe Concert Game is available
body.text: {Sender} has built a exclusive LEGO Universe Concert Arcade game called Friendly Felix’s Concert - collect this item and play for free! You can win valuable items and exclusive video from LEGO Universe, if you beat the game. Also - if you are lucky, you can win a LEGO Universe Public Skin and change your entire Public View.

body.subject: Exclusive BIO Code arrival
body.text: Thank you for entering your exclusive B.I.O. Code. As a reward, here is a special BIONICLE sticker for you to use in My LEGO Network. Place it into your inventory by clicking the "Collect Attachment" button above, and then you can use it in your Page Builder.[list]Join the Story![/list][item]Bara Magna needs a hero like you! Join me and the other Agori and Glatorians in My LEGO Network by visiting my MLN page a href="http://mln.lego.com/en-us/Network/default.aspx" here /a .

body.subject: Come back when you have sharper focus
body.text: Sorry. I'll need you to be up to speed before we can work together. Please come back when you are Rank 3.

body.subject: Opps - you did it twice
body.text: Hi friend. You already have this Blueprint, and you only need one Blueprint to build all the LEGO Club Magazine Modules you want. So please take your red LEGO Bricks back to your Inventory. If you are not familiar with how My LEGO Network is working, then go to the a href="http://mln.lego.com/Help/Gettingstarted.aspx" Getting Started /a Section under Help to watch the video tutorials.Talk later!

body.subject: My heart fills with joy
body.text: Vihow sent this? Then he too regrets our fight of so long ago. I can return to my people now! Thank you so much for taking the time to make this happen. I will never forget your kindness!

body.subject: That sound fills my mind with times of old...
body.text: The sound you sent me is so strange…and yet so soothing. I feel the urge to lighten my load. Please let me tell you what happened to me. In the meeting with the Brickota Elders, I suggested that we place a wi-fi tower inside of the next great totem pole that we build. I felt that it would be a way for us to embrace the future, while still remaining rooted to our past. The others were angry with me for making such a suggestion. I am certain that my idea was a good one, but my pride made me angry, and I said unforgiveable things. As punishment, I left forever. If you ever see Vihow again, please give him a red flower for me, to let him know that even after all this time, I still consider him a friend. For now... I wander in darkness, like a bat.

body.subject: I... I am deeply moved
body.text: I am speechless at this show of friendship. I have not called another my friend since…that terrible day. In a meeting of Brickota Elders, I said…something. The others disagreed with me, and it soon escalated into a terrible argument. In the end, I knew I had to leave. I wish…no. I can’t say any more, though I very much want to. These are secrets that no man can make me share.

body.subject: For a time I drove this...
body.text: I had job a couple of towns back driving this. I had to move on.

body.subject: I must help myself first
body.text: I so wish I could unburden myself of my secrets…but I must keep them inside. I cannot see any way I would ever feel free enough to reveal them.

body.subject: From my latest synth
body.text: Here's some stuff I recorded with Seno...

body.subject: I accept
body.text: I thank you deeply for this. Here’s something for you. Something tells me you can make good use of it.

body.subject: At your service
body.text: I am fascinated these days by all the ways that new technology can help all of us, from every walk of life. I’m working on something special right now, but I sure could use some help building the circuit boards.

body.subject: These words from your book fill my heart with hope
body.text: I owe you greatly young squire. This heroic story has filled my heart with the courage to face the day. I see it now, there are Giants in these lands! If you look you can see them too - just use your imagination. Build a Windmill Tilter and charge the Windmill Modules around the Network. Mount your mighty steed, don your gleaming armor, and steady your mind... Now, we ride out, for glory!

body.subject: So kind of you!
body.text: That’s it my friend! I can get things going again! Here's an old plan of mine I think you might to be, how do you say, very useful!

body.subject: Moon Music
body.text: Sometimes I go out to the canyon at night and play my french horn. The reverberation is wonderful.

body.subject: I accept
body.text: I thank you for your kindness. I will treasure your token of friendship. Please take this in return, and use it bravely.

body.subject: Re: Help!
body.text: While the things the Brickota Elders might teach you seem separated and unique, they are in fact all intertwined. Together, our lessons connect the past to the future, and all people to each other.

body.subject: Can you REALLY want to be my friend?
body.text: I’ll be your friend if you want…but I understand if you want - ZZZTT! - to run away now. No one sticks around very long…once they - ZZZTTZZTZ - get a look at me. As an early model, there were lots of mistakes made with me. Later iterations were much improved…but where does that – ZZTTZZZZZZ – leave me? Here alone, that’s where.

body.subject: Unearthly sounds
body.text: Such a strange tune. It brings something distant to mind. There is a lost Brickota warrior wandering the desert in search of the source of a great power. You will only hear this name once. It is Hokee, ‘The Wanderer’. If you come across him, offer a token of friendship

body.subject: I accept your friendship
body.text: Thank you for the gift, young one. This is for you. Use it wisely.

body.subject: Sounds of Nature
body.text: These bird songs, they are a wonderous music.

body.subject: I think we struck gold with you!
body.text: After thousands of years, I can tell when something is right. You have the raw materials necessary to become a wonderful member of Fleet Command. If you ever need anything on your journey, you have only to ask it of me. I’m programmed to help.

body.subject: I have confidence in our mission.
body.text: I enjoy working with people. Our mission is very important…and I trust that you won’t jeopardize it. Now my sensors tell me that there is much work to be done, so I implore you to go out there and put yourself to your fullest possible use.

body.subject: Our lost brother...
body.text: Did this come from Hokee? Where did you find him? Did you know that the new totem pole we’re building was all his idea? It’s a brilliant way for the Brickotas to remain rooted in the past while still reaching to the future, but we resisted the idea at first. It started a great argument, and Hokee felt so badly about the things he said that he banished himself from the tribe. I would so love to tell him that all is forgiven, and that he can return to us. If you see him again, please give him a potted plant from me. It will show him that I have taken his offer of friendship, and rooted it into the earth, where it can grow and flourish.

body.subject: Pinic on a Frozen Lake...
body.text: No problem friend. Last winter I organized a winter pinic for the Brickota. We played some hockey. Good times.

body.subject: I accept
body.text: I accept your token of friendship with great honor. Take this bit of wisdom, and do what you will with it.

body.subject: Great Work, Pilgrim!
body.text: These are heady days for the space program, and having someone of your credentials and experience can only help the cause. Welcome to Fleet Command! We are currently dealing with a shortage in spacecraft, and I’ve got every available person on the task. What are you waiting for? Get busy!

body.subject: Company…HALT!
body.text: I’m sorry to say this, but while you seem like a qualified candidate, there just aren’t any openings in Fleet Command right now. To be honest, I’ve got some people looking to retire, but they don’t have anywhere to go. People in Fleet Command like to move into something really special when they leave, like a Tower of Many Shields. Tell you what, if you can get me one of those, then we can make some room for you.

body.subject: I anticipate a mutually fortuitous arrangement!
body.text: Greetings, fellow sapien! The world of space travel is fraught with peril, but resourceful and savvy people can always find a niche for themselves. I am sincerely bereft to tell you this, but the last seat was just filled on our current mission. However, if you are determined to experience space travel…then no doubt you’ll find a way.

body.subject: Thou hast chosen well!
body.text: Thy wisdom shines through in thine choice of allegiances. Verily, as the male child I am the worthy heir to my father’s throne, and my sister ignores this truth at his peril. As my newest subject, I task thee to head out onto the field, and do thy part to bring victory to the House of Mantles!

body.subject: I welcome such a worthy ally!
body.text: Welcome to the fray, fellow warrior! Be on thy guard, there are spies from the accursed House of Mantles everywhere. Be sure thou hast the proper equipment for protection, and find thyself some shelter.

body.subject: Canst thou be Trusted?
body.text: I thank thee for thine overtures of friendship and camaraderie, but I cannot take the chance that thou art a spy for my accursed sister, and thus must decline thy offer at this time. Return to me with a Brickota Totem Pole, and I shalt know that thine intentions art sincere.

body.subject: There’s always room for one more!
body.text: In honor of Princess Cynthia and the House of Gauntlets, I welcome thee to the contest! Thy timing could not be better, as we are on the verge of proving once and for all our superiority over the House of Mantles. If thou art ready to join the cause, then I beseech thee to give us the shields we need to give our side the edge it so sorely needs.

body.subject: Removed from your friendlist
body.text: {Sender} has removed you from their friendlist. Don't take it too hard! There’s lots of other people to be friends with in My LEGO Network.

body.subject: Not yet, My Friend.
body.text: I’m sorry, but I can’t be your friend just yet. You seem like a kind soul, but my people do not rush into friendships without caution. Perhaps, if you play a tune for me on an Enchanted Harp, I will know for certain that your intentions are pure.

body.subject: Please come back later
body.text: I’m sorry to have to do this, but things are a little hectic around here, and we can’t really accept any new friends. Hey, maybe when you get an Enchanted Harp, you could come back and calm all our nerves. That would be so wonderful, and I’m sure there are lots of things we could teach you in return.

body.subject: It’s not quite time for friendship
body.text: I appreciate your offer of friendship, but I’m sorry to say that I cannot accept at this time. My training is in full effect these days, and so I am forever on full alert. Perhaps a tune from an Enchanted Harp could calm me down sufficiently to meet a person such as yourself.

body.subject: Concert II Arcade is available
body.text: {Sender} has built a great Concert II Arcade game - collect this item and play for free! You can win exclusive items, if you beat the game.

body.subject: Welcome to the Big Time!
body.text: Hey Kid! You made a good choice making friends with me. I don’t mean to brag, but my show is pretty influential in the music world. David Lampton was a street performer before I put him on the air, and Sandee Starreyed would still be unknown without me! All the best musicians drop by. Let’s just say that, if you really want to make it in this business, then stick with me.

body.subject: The writing on the wall...
body.text: It's funny how this works. I'm supposed to reject your friendship because you haven't gotten to build the Craftsman Cottage. Why? It doesn't really make sense... Unless, yes now I see. We agree first that building this "cottage" is worth doing, sure, look at all the wonderful things you've made along the way. And then, my role, yes, to lead further down the line. My problem though... I'm not quite aware of where all this is going or if there is, indeed, only one line to travel. Something to think about...

body.subject: Way of the Totemic Animals
body.text: There is wisdom and guidance to be gained from many of the animals on the land. Each of the Brickota Elders is an expert on one of them. Once we have a true friendship, we will share this wisdom with you.

body.subject: Don’t get lost in the shuffle
body.text: I really appreciate your wanting to be my friend, but I’m sorry to say that’s just impossible right now. With agents, handlers, reporters, composers, bookers, fans and bodyguards at my house all day long, friends end up getting overlooked, and I hate that. Write me back when you have a Craftsman Cottage where we can escape all this madness, and I’m sure we’ll have a lot to discuss.

body.subject: Yeah!
body.text: Wow cool! You looked like a kid into cool music. Check this out:

body.subject: It's true... I do love Izzy Bop.
body.text: Speak the truth!

body.subject: The Brickota people are looking for ways to embrace modern times, while still remaining true to their ancient beliefs. Please keep an eye out for ways they can do both.
body.text: Facing the day...

body.subject: You’re Breaking Up…
body.text: I’m impressed that you’ve found me, Networker! You seem like a person worthy to be my friend. However, your connection is faint, and without a reliable way for us to create and maintain contact, I just can’t see this friendship working. Return to me once you build an Intergalactic Cruiser, and I’ll be happy to share the secrets of the stars with you.

body.subject: Thank you, Dearie!
body.text: These apples look absolutely perfect. I hope you don’t mind a friendly reminder, but please be sure to visit your LEGO Tree Module on your public page often. Plants need love and affection as much as people, and if it feels loved, it’ll grow more Red LEGO Bricks for you. If you see an arrow pointing down when you visit, then you know it’s time to harvest. Take good care of my Mason Jar Blueprint. I must say, it’s been VERY helpful for me! Those jars can be used for so many things! My friend Bee Keeper Bill is always running out. In fact, I bet he’s looking to trade for some right now. If you’re lucky, he’ll teach you how to grow Worker Bees! Flora is looking for bees to help in her gardens. I know she’d trade with you for great stuff…but maybe you could be a sweetie, and just send one her way to say hi![list]To Do List[/list][item]Go to your Inventory and build 2 Mason Jars.[item]Bee Keeper Bill will trade you the Worker Bee Blueprint for 2 Mason Jars.[item]Build your first Worker Bees and go to Floras page.

body.subject: Roll up your sleeves!
body.text: Oh my! Excellent job finding the special VIP code for the new and improved Plastic Pellet Inductor Module Blueprint. You are bound to have exponentially more fun with this speedy little device! So get busy building wonderful creations and gizmos in the LEGO Universe Creation Lab and upload them to your new gallery module. The plastic pellets you will procure will come in quite handy indeed! One can never have enough plastic pellets these days...[list]To Do List[/list][item]Collect attached Blueprint and build the Plastic Pellet Inductor Module in your Inventory.[item]Upload an image to Creation Lab on LEGO Universe website.[item]Go to your Page builder section and drag Plastic Pellet Inductor Module to your page.[item]Now you can choose this image in your Module and you can show your work to rest of My LEGO Network.[item]Visit Prof Brickkeeper to earn your Creation Lab badge!

body.subject: Thanks for your answer
body.text: Hi. It's ok - talk later, friend.

body.subject: Thanks for your answer
body.text: Thanks! Thanks. I am really happy that you want to join us at MLN. You deserve this Blue print - now go make some Apples...see you around the Network, friend! Friend.

body.subject: New Arcade game - play now
body.text: {Sender} has built a great Arcade game called Delivery - collect this item and play for free! You can win exclusive items and Blue LEGO Bricks, if you beat the game.

body.subject: New Arcade game - play now
body.text: {Sender} has built a great Arcade game called Destructoid - collect this item and play for free! You can win exclusive items, if you beat the game.

body.subject: New Arcade game - play now
body.text: {Sender} has built a great Arcade game called Hop - collect this item and play for free! You can win exclusive items, if you beat the game.

body.subject: I guess I can help you...
body.text: OK my Friend. Let me give you some direction. Prof Brickkeeper can help us both. So please hurry and send him this Worn Tuning Fork.[list]To Do List[/list][item]Collect Worn Tuning Fork.[item]Send Worn Tuning Fork to Prof Brickkeeper.[item]Check your mail.[item]Join a href="http://universe.lego.com/creationlab/DisplayCreationList.aspx?challengeid=89abe7f3-c190-49dd-ae3d-91d7f3270279" My LEGO Network /a challenge in the Creation Lab on LEGO Universe website.[item]Get your creation approved.[item]Then get the Retuned Tuning Fork Blueprint from the unlock page.[item]Now show your creation on your own page in the Plastic Inductor Module and earn Plastic Pellets.[item]Befriend Numb Chuck and Capt Jack Knife and they will help you the rest of the way.

body.subject: A String Surgeon, Are ya?
body.text: Listen up younglings – I see what you’ve done there with your avatar, making it all see-through and what not. Well, alls I can say is that you don’t want to go messing around too much with this here postal system – or you may end up wandering the halls of the dead letter post office for a while. I can’t rightly tell you it’s a fun kinda wandering neither. But I have to tip my hat to you for trying something creative! That’s what My LEGO Network is all about – but just don’t want to see mess with the wrong piece of code and ruin your account or somebody else's good times. So if you could be so kind as to re-visible yourself, I think we can agree to a “no harm done”? But let’s not try it again, for the sake of your account and for your fellow Networkers – especially the old, cranky ones like me![list]Notice[/list][item]If you continue to do illegal changes to your My LEGO Network settings, your entire account at LEGO.com will be deleted. We therefore hope that you will play by the rules in future. Play well!

body.subject: Rank 2 already...
body.text: Fantastico – you did it again! Again. I’m really impressed. Now that you know your way around this Network, I guess you are ready to continue to next level and work with Blue LEGO Bricks, just like the one I have attached here. This 2nd level should keep you busy for a while.[list]To Do List[/list][item]Start this challenge by visiting Bartlebee and trade for his T-square.[item]Check out all the Networkers on Rank 3.[item]Now you are on your own…

body.subject: You are too good!
body.text: Did you just make your first Bee Battle Module? I would like to help you, but I have to work of course.[list]Hint[/list][item]You can send a message to your friends with the subject "My Bee Battle Module is ready for a battle! Care to challenge me?". You find this message in "Click Request" Category.

body.subject: I want to honor you, my friend
body.text: I appreciate that you have held on to your codes! Take this BIONICLE Sticker and use it in your Sticker Module to show your great loyalty. Stay strong, stay vigilant.

body.subject: I want to honor you, my friend
body.text: I appreciate that you have held on to your codes! Take this BIONICLE Sticker and use it in your Sticker Module to show your great loyalty. Stay strong, stay vigilant.

body.subject: I want to honor you, my friend
body.text: I appreciate that you have held on to your codes! Take this BIONICLE Sticker and use it in your Sticker Module to show your great loyalty. Stay strong, stay vigilant.

body.subject: You're still on track, friend! friend.
body.text: Hi my friend. I am soo happy to see that you just made your first Hive Module. You are heading directly for Rank 2. See you later! later.[list]To Do List[/list][item]Add the Hive Module to your Public page.[item]Remember to go to your own Public page to Set Up the Hive Module. It costs you a Mason Jar and a Pollinated Bee.[item]Harvest your Hive Module on a regular basis.[item]When you have 20 Honey Pots, then go visit Bee Keeper Bill to trade for the Royal Hive Queen Masterpiece Blueprint.[item]Go to your Inventory to look at this Blueprint. As you can see, final task is to get hold of the Drone Bee.[item]Become friend with Bartlebee and send him a Flower.[item]Check mail.

body.subject: An ambush in the desert
body.text: You encounter the Zesk as it emerges from the sands to attack. It howls at the burning desert sun and tunnels back under the hot Bara Magna sands. Perhaps it would be better to come back when you could offer him something to eat?

body.subject: Excessive haste could prove disastrous!
body.text: Ordinarily, I’d welcome friendship from one such as yourself, but I’m afraid two factors prevent me from doing so at this time. Firstly, I recognize that my status as a hyper-literate primate makes me something of a novelty, and I must exercise restraint in my relationships, lest one of them prove to be parasitic. Secondarily (and more appropriately in your case), Fleet Command places me in very hazardous situations, and anyone caught unprepared could become exposed to dangerous things. Please return once you have erected a Tower of Many Shields. That construct should protect you from anything you’d encounter in my vicinity.

body.subject: But you're not up to snuff.
body.text: I'm so sorry...

body.subject: You got it right!
body.text: Great job. You are pretty darn close to show your construction skills to rest of the Network. I'm so looking forward to seeing all the rewards from the City Construction game on your page.[list]Hint[/list][item]You will find the Blueprint for City Trophy Room Module in your Inventory.[item]Go to your Inventory and build the module.[item]Now go to your Page Builder and drag it in to your page.[item]City Trophy Room Module will now show your rewards from the work you have done in LEGO City Construction game.[item]Keep up the good work!

body.subject: Yeah man I'm up for a trade...
body.text: All of us racing types need Tires, LOTS of them! Scrap Yard will trade you a Tire for a Muffler. Radia will trade you a Tire for a Carburetor. MacRacer will trade you a Tire for Nitro. I will trade you a Tire for a Spoiler.

body.subject: Help?
body.text: Dude. Chill. It's all A-Ok. Just keep building those Solar Power Cells, Stunt Cars and Race Cars. Visit your friend's page and race! It'll all work out man. You just gotta take your time. Don't let anybody rush you.

body.subject: Re: I wanna Rock!
body.text: You wanna rock? Dude, goes without saying. How's about you listen to this. It's the sound of me leaving you in the dust on the track. Oh and if you want to know more about what I got to trade send me a "Wanna Trade?" message under the Trading Category. Peace Bro!

body.subject: Score!
body.text: Hey man, thanks for this. I don't know what's up with the Tires in the Network these days. I think that Merchobot is bugged out or something. Anyways... Here's that Spoiler. This thing is pretty rad - makes for a very fast, very cool ride. Later brohan.

body.subject: Tire Shortage?
body.text: All of us racing types need Tires, LOTS of them! Scrap Yard will trade you a Tire for a Muffler. Radia will trade you a Tire for a Carburetor. I will trade you a Tire for Nitro. Pedalman Wheelie will trade you a Tire for a Spoiler.

body.subject: Re: Help!
body.text: Slow down there little buddy... life's not so bad. You gotta build Stunt Cars and Race Cars first. Race them in your friend's modules, each Car rank has a matching track module rank. You'll need a Solar Power Cell for each race, so you best get growing Yellow Bricks. It takes a while to do, but you gotta learn to relax and enjoy the road. It's not a race to get to Rank 4! Take it easy!

body.subject: Well Sure Buddy!
body.text: Of course you can have a Sticker. Here's a LEGO Racers one I think looks pretty sweet. If you want to know more about what I got to trade send me a "Wanna Trade?" message under the Trading Category. Ya'll take care now, ya hear?

body.subject: Round, Rubber, Rocking!
body.text: Well gosh! Scrap Yard Joe was plum out of these. Thank goodness you came along. Here's some Nitro for your cars. Be real careful with this stuff, ok?

body.subject: Solar Saxophone
body.text: I prefer Jazz to Rock. I hope you like it anyway. It reminds me of a sunny day on the beach. If you want to know more about what I got to trade send me a "Wanna Trade?" message under the Trading Category.

body.subject: Well... Got any Tires?
body.text: All of us racing types need Tires, LOTS of them! Scrap Yard will trade you a Tire for a Muffler. I will trade you a Tire for a Carburetor. MacRacer will trade you a Tire for Nitro. Pedalman Wheelie will trade you a Tire for a Spoiler. Oh and also - I may have something very interesting for you - if you could spare an Engine.

body.subject: Re: Help!
body.text: Patience Cousin... I mean Friend. To get a racing trophy you need to complete all of the Stunt and Racing Modules. You'll then be able to build the trophy from the ribbons you've collected. Oh... I wanted to ask you, do you have an extra Engine you could spare? I just burned another one out trying to perfect my new solar power harvesting engine. I know it's asking a lot but if you can send me one I will give you something that will help both you and your friends!

body.subject: Trading for Tires
body.text: All of us racing types need Tires, LOTS of them! I will trade you a Tire for a Muffler. Radia will trade you a Tire for a Carburetor. MacRacer will trade you a Tire for Nitro. Pedalman Wheelie will trade you a Tire for a Spoiler.

body.subject: Muffler for a Tire, yup.
body.text: Yup! Just like I said, here you go!

body.subject: I use this to truck in my yard!
body.text: Here you go, pal. Will look real nice in a Scrap Yard Joe's Sticker Module, don't ya think? If you want to know more about what I got to trade send me a "Wanna Trade?" message under the Trading Category.

body.subject: No Refunds!
body.text: Help? Oh you must mean with Merchobot... yeah. Looks like he's not working right. No refunds! Sorry - it's the first rule of the Scrap Yard. So I think he does make Tires for people. He just sends them out to the wrong people. Check with people on your friendlist - they'll turn up.

body.subject: Great job - now you can build LEGO Tree Module
body.text: This is great for you! You! Now you can build more LEGO Tree Modules and add them on your page - this will give you even more Red LEGO Bricks. I actually think you should have this sticker from me - you're doing so great! Great.

body.subject: You surprise me!
body.text: You are too good, my friend! I have this exclusive item for you. please keep it in a save spot. I hope to see you back soon.

body.subject: You brickrupted me!
body.text: Welcome back, my friend. I am all out of rewards for now, but please try again later and I might have something for you. Here are some more Red LEGO Bricks, so you can play again later.

body.subject: I want to honor you, my friend
body.text: I appreciate that you have held on to your codes! Take this BIONICLE Sticker and use it in your Sticker Module to show your great loyalty. Stay strong, stay vigilant.

body.subject: Glitch Error in your favor?
body.text: Look what {Sender}'s Pet Glitch Module has for you! A cool Loop for your SoundTrack Module!

body.subject: I want to honor you, my friend
body.text: I appreciate that you have held on to your codes! Take this BIONICLE Sticker and use it in your Sticker Module to show your great loyalty. Stay strong, stay vigilant.

body.subject: Nice going!
body.text: This is your captain speaking! You are doing quite ok on this Rocket game. Great to meet you!! Maybe you can use some of these these items in your struggle to next rank?

body.subject: Hold right there
body.text: In order to get access to my laboratory, you need to complete the Dice Quest adventure and receive your Dice Quest badge. Continue the fun by going back to the LEGO Games page and find all the hidden dice pieces.[list]To Do List[/list][item]Complete Dice Quest on LEGO Games website[item]Collect Dice Badge blueprint[item]Construct Dice Badge[item]Befriend Stanley Brick[item]Trade for the cool Video item[item]Play well

body.subject: Welcome friend!
body.text: Welcome! Only those who complete the Dice Quest adventure and build their Dice Quest badge are invited to this special place where I develop my most creative and imaginative game ideas!

body.subject: Thank you so much for Beta testing
body.text: Thank you so much for being a Beta Tester on My LEGO Network! Your feedback helped us a great deal. Your account has now been reset. But you've reached Rank 3 and earned the exclusive Beta Tester Blueprint. Also you've earned this cool Beta Tester Badge, some extra Red LEGO Bricks and my personal note of thanks which you can use to make friends with Kludge Dropcolumn - a new Networker! You'll be able to earn even more rewards at his page!

body.subject: Thank you so much for Beta testing
body.text: Thank you so much for being a Beta Tester on My LEGO Network! Your feedback helped us a great deal. Your account has been reset. Unfortunately you did not reach Rank 3 to win the exclusive Beta Tester Blueprint, but you did earn this cool Beta Tester Badge, some extra Red LEGO Bricks and my personal note of thanks which you can use to make friends with Kludge Dropcolumn - a new Networker! You'll be able to earn even more rewards at his page!

body.subject: Look what the panther dragged in!
body.text: Wow! Look what you got from {Sender}'s Pet Panther Module! That's a pretty big catch!

body.subject: Bat Treat!
body.text: Wow! Look what you got from {Sender}'s Pet Bat Module!

body.subject: Ambush!
body.text: {Sender} has a Dino Ambush on their page! Watch Out!

body.subject: Rock? Hmmm... I'm looking it up...
body.text: A rock? I don't see a rock in the My LEGO Network Item Guide... How do I do it? Oh! LOL! Like Rock Music? LOL! I get it. I'm laughing so much! Oh no, I spilled my drink on the keyboard. I thinkls oksddfj jd ds djf kdslkj flksdjf fdkslllllf dk nhdjdlj4n sd fjee dl sdflkpg

body.subject: Re: Help!
body.text: Ok! So like I'm thinking that like you could actually help me instead. Cool? Ok could you like run down to see Pel Tonne and see if maybe you could get a hold of a Beaver to help me out building my mill? Those little guys are so cute! Smart too! Did you know they can lift a hundred times their body weight? Oh no wait, that's an ant. Or something like that... Wait, what was I talking about, oh right you needed help? Gosh, I don't know what to say.

body.subject: Pel Tonne's Tones
body.text: Here's some music I play around the Beaver Dam... Seems to help them focus on their work. Enjoy!

body.subject: Re: Help!
body.text: I find when I'm stuck I just need to take a second and observe my surroundings. The answer is usually right there, like when I studied the Beavers' construction to build my own Electro-Dam. They taught me everything I need to know. I just wish they could help me carry a MillStone down here - I really need one to test out my new design.

body.subject: Very impressive LEGO building young squire
body.text: I can see from your LEGO building you are indeed a wonderful creator. You mind runs wildly with imagination. Take this and may it remind you of your true calling, you are a builder of wonderful things and conjurer of the highest order!

body.subject: From a long time ago...
body.text: Take this portrait of a fair princess... I don't need it any longer. May it bring you the inspiration and happiness I used to feel.

body.subject: Alas, what help am I to you now?
body.text: What help can I be to you? I'm just an old fool... If only I had a Heroic Story to lift my spirits. I used to be able to find them from my Quioxic Gallery Module. Ah, but I've lost the will to build. Alas. Go now, I can't bare for you to see me this way.

body.subject: Ok! Ok! Here.
body.text: I don't mean to be so rude. I'm sorry. I'm just late on these plans because I lost my T-Square. But here you go - I think you will like the, how you say, sweet riffs.

body.subject: I'm too busy right now.
body.text: Why you asking me for the help? Can't you see I'm too busy? I gotta get these plans done. Go see bother my friends Pel Tonne or Milly P Enstock.

body.subject: This one is for you, my friend!
body.text: {Sender} has new Concert I Arcade Module available on public page - collect this item and go play!

body.subject: Out of Votes

You need to place a "start" on your map to test this game.

DELIVERY REMINDER
1st. Green House
2nd. Yellow House
3rd. Red House

Click and drag a tile on to the map to place it.
Click a placed tile to delete it.
Scenery, add some spice to your game!
Use the arrow keys to get to the different houses in the right order.
In Delivery, your goal is to deliver packages in the correct order to three different houses.
First delivery to the green house, then the yellow house, and finally the red house before the timer runs out!
Here is where you can make your very own personalized versions of the game. Start with the paths to set the walkable areas of your map and where each checkpoint of delivery should be.
Remember, the houses need to be set on paths or you won't be able to reach them for delivery!
Click to set your blocks where you want them. 1 is weak, 3 is strong. Use stars and bombs to make your game more fun and difficult!
In order to post a game on your page you’ll need to be able to beat it. When you finish editing go to the test tab to try it.

SKIN
Background, character and bricks for your game.

tips.tip:
In the Know
You didn't hear it here, but there's some super secret Networkers lurking around My LEGO Network. Sometimes they will grant you extra special blueprints - once you've found these you'll tend want to track down others who are in the know, and they'll want to come find you too!

Traders, All of You!
Setting up trade modules is a great way to get others to come to your page. Rare items make for more interest around your page - so get building!

For me? You shouldn't have
There are a lot of modules that send out great prizes to people on the owner's friend list. These are great way to build up clicks and keep your friends coming back for more.

You Look Marvelous
Be sure you spend a lot of time making your avatar just right; it's the easiest way for others to recognize you around the Network, and with recognition comes clicks!

Share the Wealth!
Some modules, like the BFF Module, give out items to more than one person. Using these modules is a great way to not only build up your page but your relationships to others as well.

Creativity is King
Make sure what's in your creative modules is as good as you can make it. People will be more likely to spend their clicks with you if you make something cool and interesting.

Now you kids play nice!
As in life, in My LEGO Network it's best to be gracious and kind to others. Be sure to stop by and spend your clicks with people on your friend list as often as you can. Most often your My LEGO Network friends will visit your page too - as it's in their favor to do so.

Location, Location, Location!
Place your most important modules in the upper left. People naturally look there first as that's the way we read words - at least in English anyway!

Sometimes less is more
You don't always have to fill up your page with modules. Having a couple of well-placed modules will focus others attention on the things you want clicked the most.

Creativity pays!
Make sure to use plenty of Gallery, Sticker and Factory Modules to make your My LEGO masterpieces faster.
